solution_line_template: She found {num_quarters} quarters that are ${value_quarter} each so she found {num_quarters}*{value_quarter} = $<<{num_quarters}*{value_quarter}={total_quarters_value}>>{total_quarters_value}
She found {num_dimes} dimes that are ${value_dime} each so she found {num_dimes}*{value_dime} = $<<{num_dimes}*{value_dime}={total_dimes_value}>>{total_dimes_value}
She found {num_nickels} nickels that are ${value_nickel} each so she found {num_nickels}*{value_nickel} = $<<{num_nickels}*{value_nickel}={total_nickels_value}>>{total_nickels_value}
She found {num_pennies} pennies that are ${value_penny} each so she found {num_pennies}*{value_penny} = $<<{num_pennies}*{value_penny}={total_pennies_value}>>{total_pennies_value}
All total she found {total_quarters_value}+{total_dimes_value}+{total_nickels_value}+{total_pennies_value} = ${total_money_found} in change
